channel.title: A HUGE reason why runescape sucks
channel.description: I think a huge reason why runescape is failing right now is because my brand new laptop cannot even run that piece of shit game. here is my laptop http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Asus+-+14%22+Laptop+-+4GB+Memory+-+320GB+Hard+Drive+-+Matte+Lime+Green/5732494.p?id=1218688221035&skuId=5732494 most people don't have nice computers to play runescape and why should they? one more thing, they try to make you buy membership for all of the crap they have on that crappy game

item.title: A HUGE reason why runescape sucks
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You call that a laptop? I call that the trash under my bed.

Read full topic

the real question is ( howlong did i take to actually type in (http://www.moparisthebest.com ) in the url browser … im not even tryna make fun of u im serious

@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Unlucky, if possible return it and buy a new one and ask for advice (not from a salesman) on whats good and whats not.[/quote] no i saw the price which was 200 lol on black friday

item.title: A HUGE reason why runescape sucks
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

How the hell do you expect RuneScape to always run on computers from 1999 with their advanced graphics? An example is Half-Life 1 and how it used to run on 1999 machines, but Half-Life 2 cannot. Is it their fault that players demand fancier graphics?

they try to make you buy membership for all of the crap they have on that crappy game
It's called business. Go to school or something.
